row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred
! :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&UC4RB_LDAP_PASSWORD#" ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
:set &pos#=str_find(&FOLDER_ID#,"/") :set &pos#=&pos#+1 :set &FOLDER_SANS_CHEMIN#=str_cut(&FOLDER_ID#,&pos#)
$Pass = "&PASSWORD#" $User = "&USER#" $VsphereServer = "&VSPHERE_SERVER#"
$Password = ConvertTo-SecureString "$Pass" -AsPlainText -Force ! Write-host $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password) ! $mycredentials = New-Object System.management.Automation.PSCredential ("$User",$Password)
Add-PsSnapin VMware.VimAutomation.Core Write-host Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass Connect-VIServer -Server $VsphereServer -Protocol https -Username $User -Password $Pass
$VM_IN_FOLDER=Get-Folder "&FOLDER_SANS_CHEMIN#" -location "&DATACENTER_NAME#" | Get-VM | Measure-ObjEct $NB=$VM_IN_FOLDER.Count if ($NB -gt &MAX_VM_NB#) { Write-host "$NB VM in folder " Write-host ":change:YES" } Else {
Write-host "$NB VM in folder "
}
! @set retcode=%errorlevel% ! @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode

row.post_process: :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(, , "RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP", , "COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*:change:*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &FLAG_CHANGE_FOLDER# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : IF &FLAG_CHANGE_FOLDER#="YES" : P CHANGE FOLDER = &FLAG_CHANGE_FOLDER# : set &length#=STR_LENGTH("&FOLDER_ID#") : set &pos#=&length#-2 : set &pos_1#=&pos#-1 : set &prefix#=str_cut("&FOLDER_ID#",1,&pos_1#) : set &count#=str_cut("&FOLDER_ID#",&pos#) : p &prefix# : p &count# : set &count#=&count#+1 : set &count#=format(&count#,"000") : set &folder_id#=&prefix#&count# : publish &folder_id#,,"WORKFLOW" : PUT_var_col "VARA.ASO.VM.TEMPLATE","&Srv_Type#_&OS_court#",2,&FOLDER_ID# : p &folder_id# : endif : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
